carrental

Interface CarManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CarManagerImpl

    public interface CarManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCar(Car car)
      Create new car in database.
      void deleteCar(Car car)
      Delete car in database by id.

    • Method Detail

      • createCar

        void createCar(Car car)
               throws ServiceFailureException
        Create new car in database. Database generates id.
        Parameters:
        car - car to be created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when car or numberPlate or pricePerDay is null also the id MUST be null or pricePerDay is equals or less than zero or numberPlate is empty string.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • updateCar

        void updateCar(Car car)
               throws ServiceFailureException
        Update car in database by id.
        Parameters:
        car - car to be updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when car is null, or id, numberPlate, pricePerDay is null or id <= 0 or numberPlate is empty String or pricePerDay <= 0.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • deleteCar

        void deleteCar(Car car)
               throws ServiceFailureException
        Delete car in database by id.
        Parameters:
        car - car to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when car is null, or car.getId() is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • findCarById

        Car findCarById(java.lang.Long id)
                throws ServiceFailureException
        Find Car by id in database.
        Parameters:
        id - id of car to be found.
        Returns:
        Found car or null if car with specified id is not in database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when id is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • findAllCars

        java.util.List<Car> findAllCars()
                                throws ServiceFailureException
        Generate list of all cars in database.
        Returns:
        list of all cars in database.
        Throws:
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.
